info.title: Get SEC Filings Data
info.description: Fetches the latest 10-Q and 10-K filings from the SEC. Prioritizes HTML filing links and gracefully falls back to Excel versions when applicable. Also supports alias learning and GitHub persistence.

get.description: Returns the latest available 10-Q and 10-K filings for a given company name or ticker symbol.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: The public company name or ticker symbol (e.g., Apple, AAPL, Meta, RH).

200.description: Matched metadata and filing links returned from the SEC.

CIK.description: The Central Index Key used to fetch filings.

10-Q Filing.description: Direct HTML link to the most recent 10-Q filing, or null if unavailable.

10-K Filing.description: Returns 10-K HTML report if available, else falls back to Excel file. Returns null if neither is found.

404.description: No filings or company match found.
